name: Hell Shooter (itch)
description:
Hell Shooter is a game where you play as a lonely spirit that has to fight out of the 9 floors of hell.

  • There is currently one level that is playable: Limbo.
  • The lonely spirit has 3 different weapons at his disposal: double laser, shotgun and the powerful laser gun.
  • Fight 4 different merciless enemies: Spirits, Zombies, Shields and The Boss.
  • Boost the lonely spirit with 3 unique different item pick ups; including movement speed boost, invincibility and a health pack .
  • Take down 2 different enemy spawners before you get overrun: Spirit spawner and Zombie spawner.
  • Beware environmental hazards as some enemies might leave a deadly acid goop behind.
  • Try to get a highscore as you play! All of the enemies are worth different points.
  • There is also a working health bar to help you track your hp.

Controls:

  • W - Move forwards
  • S - Move backwards
  • A - Move left
  • D - Move right
  • Aim - With mouse
  • Shoot - Left click
